dw:transform-message.doc:name: XML to Contact
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload.BAPI_CUSTOMER_GETCONTACTLIST.tables.CONTACTADDRESSDATA map { LastName : $.LASTNAME, FirstName : $.FIRSTNAME, Email : $.E_MAIL, MailingCity : $.CITY, MailingCountry : $.COUNTRY, MailingPostalCode : $.POSTL_COD1, MailingStreet : $.STREET, Description : $.PERS_NO, MailingState : $.STREET, (AccountId : $.CUSTOMER) when $.CUSTOMER != null }

enricher.doc:name: enrich payload with existing contact Id

sfdc:query-single.query: Select Name, Id from Contact where LastName = '#[payload['LastName']]' and FirstName = '#[payload['FirstName']]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: Query Salesforce for Contact

dw:transform-message.doc:name: SAP Customer to Salesforce Account
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload:
%dw 1.0 %output application/java
%var export = payload.BAPI_CUSTOMER_GETDETAIL2.export --- { Name: export.CUSTOMERADDRESS.NAME, Fax: export.CUSTOMERCOMPANYDETAIL.FAX }

sfdc:query-single.query: SELECT Id, Name FROM Account WHERE Name = '#[recordVars.sapCustomer.Name]'
sfdc:query-single.doc:name: Query Account in Salesforce Instance

choice.doc:name: Does the corresponding account need to be created in Salesforce?
